org.bytedeco.depthai

Class RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.depthai.RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    RawStereoDepthConfig

    public static class RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing
extends Pointer
    Post-processing filters, all the filters are applied in disparity domain.

      • bilateralSigmaValue

        @Cast(value="std::int16_t")
public short bilateralSigmaValue()
        Sigma value for bilateral filter. 0 means disabled. A larger value of the parameter means that farther colors within the pixel neighborhood will be mixed together.

      • bilateralSigmaValue

        public RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing bilateralSigmaValue(short setter)

public RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing.SpatialFilter spatialFilter()

        @ByRef
public RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing.ThresholdFilter thresholdFilter()
        Threshold filtering. Filters out distances outside of a given interval.

      • thresholdFilter

        public RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing thresholdFilter(RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing.ThresholdFilter setter)

      • brightnessFilter

        @ByRef
public RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing.BrightnessFilter brightnessFilter()
        Brightness filtering. If input frame pixel is too dark or too bright, disparity will be invalidated. The idea is that for too dark/too bright pixels we have low confidence, since that area was under/over exposed and details were lost.

      • brightnessFilter

        public RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing brightnessFilter(RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing.BrightnessFilter setter)

      • speckleFilter

        @ByRef
public RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing.SpeckleFilter speckleFilter()
        Speckle filtering. Removes speckle noise.

      • speckleFilter

        public RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing speckleFilter(RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing.SpeckleFilter setter)

      • decimationFilter

        @ByRef
public RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing.DecimationFilter decimationFilter()
        Decimation filter. Reduces disparity/depth map x/y complexity, reducing runtime complexity for other filters.

      • decimationFilter

        public RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing decimationFilter(RawStereoDepthConfig.PostProcessing.DecimationFilter setter)
